alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy; Jim Hogg; Kenedy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 9:20PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...An outflow boundary with gusty northerly winds from thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Kenedy, northern Jim Hogg and northern Brooks Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 918 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary with gusty northerly winds from thunderstorms along a line extending from near Benavides to near Malaquite Beach. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Falfurrias, Hebbronville, Sarita, Kenedy County Wind Farms, Gruy Stadium, La Colonia Park, Airport Road Addition, U S 77 Border Patrol Station, South Fork Estates and Falfurrias Junior High School. This includes the following highways... US Highway 77 between mile markers 710 and 732. US Highway 281 between mile markers 708 and 728. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brooks; Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy; Jim Hogg; Kenedy Island
